trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event occurs when code executing by way of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> throws an exception which is not handled.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento ocorre quando código em execução por way do <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher>emite uma exceção que não é processada.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento fornece um meio para não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event is raised first, and If <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> on the DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>o evento é gerado pela primeira vez e se <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A>no DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs está definido como `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs.RequestCatch%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception that was raised when executing code by way of the dispatcher.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a exceção que foi gerada ao executar código título o dispatcher.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the exception should be caught and the event handlers called.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define se deve ser detetada a exceção e os processadores de eventos chamado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter> event provides a means to not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>evento fornece um meio para não gerar o <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledExceptionFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> is raised first, and If RequestCatch on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> event will not be raised.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>é gerado primeiro e, se RequestCatch no <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs>está definido como `false`, a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>evento não será gerado.</xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherUnhandledExceptionFilterEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException>

trans-unit.source: A previous handler in the event multicast might have already set this property to `false`, indicating that the exception will not be caught.
trans-unit.target: Um processador anterior multicast de eventos poderá já definiu esta propriedade para `false`, que indica que a exceção não será detetada.

trans-unit.source: The "don't catch" behavior will override all others because it most likely means a debugging scenario.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento de "não catch" irá substituir todas as outras pessoas porque provavelmente significa um cenário de depuração.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"></xref> should be raised; otherwise; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.UnhandledException"> </xref> deve ser gerado; caso contrário; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
